sentences.sentence: The system has 256 MB RAM, expandable to 2GB.
sentences.translation: 这个系统内存 256 兆字节，可扩充到 2 千兆字节。

sentences.sentence: He has been developing so-called expandable space habitats, a technology he bought from NASA a number of years ago.
sentences.translation: 他一直在开发所谓可伸展的太空屋，这是他几年前从美国宇航局购买的技术。

sentences.sentence: A polling group can have any number of participants as well as an expandable list of polling categories.
sentences.translation: 一个调查组可以包含任意数量的参与者和可扩展的调查类别列表。
